title: Introduce “Simple Mode” defaults to reduce configuration complexity on first run

sections.text: Add a “Simple Mode” onboarding path that preselects a minimal, recommended set of alerts, templates, and models suitable for small teams, with the option to switch to “Advanced” later. Ensure the default configuration auto-enables only core Sales_Accelerator workflows (forecasting, next-best-action, risk alerts) using Customer_Analyzer fit/positioning inputs without requiring manual tuning. This ticket covers backend/default-config and state management; UI surfacing and progressive disclosure will be handled in subsequent tickets.
